title: What do you think about Ariana Grande's new song 'Don't Call Me Angel'? - Quora

response.answer_text: AMAZING!!!! Although I do hate how Miley and Lana stans are so ungrateful. Especially Lana fans. What they don’t understand is that the song was offered to Ariana and she asked for them to be on the song. Why not just be happy with what they gave? The song’s amazing. My favourite parts come from Ariana and Miley but Lana’s was just so….. shaking and chilling and gave it a whole new vibe. I really love the song. The way their voices all blend flawlessly together and how they all look stunning in the video. It’s my favourite song right now and it deserves all the praise it’s been receiving.
I like it. There was a time a couple of weeks ago when I would listen to it on replay OVER AND OVER again. LOL!
